context: Hello! What kind of movies are you into? I'm well, I hope you are, too.
I loved The Professional (1981) and would love to see something similar It was such a great movie!

Oh okay cool. Haven't seen it Know of any others?

resp: If you like spy movies but are in the mood for something lighter, I always enjoyed True Lies (1994)
